title: Indies In New York 2016
desc: INDIES IN NY 2016 is a 1 day book signing event to be *****Please make sure to read each ticket description closely before purchasing.***** THERE WILL BE NO REFUNDS OFFERED. YOU MAY HOWEVER TRANSFER TICKETS TO ANOTHER READER. YOU MUST CONTACT AN EVENT ORGANIZER TO DO THIS. MUST BE 18+ TO ATTEND ANY EVENT. NO EXCEPTIONS! Visit the event website www.IndiesInNY.com Hashtag it #INDIESINNY16 If you have any questions, please email us at indiesinny@gmail.com Thanks and we look forward to meeting you!!
